info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 15 at 10:14AM EDT until July 17 at 10:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida...
Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County.
Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301 affecting Hillsborough County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little Manatee River at Wimauma at US 301.
* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Thursday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river overflows its banks.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 4.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 11.6 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.6 feet on 09/02/1959. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued by 11pmlate tonight by 115 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING
